Name: Game Of Puzzles: Space
About the game: Game Of Puzzles: Space - is a game in which you have to rotate puzzle pieces to solve a puzzle. Features: 50 levels Suitable for all ages Simple mouse control A range of sizes from 16 to 36 pieces Simple and understandable gameplay Steam Achievements Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
